msbt.message: Your present got me more pumped than a triple-weight bench press!
I got your present! I didn't expect it to be so fun to lift!
I totally wasn't expecting your gift. Way to make leg day extra special!
I have no idea what I lifted to deserve such an amazing present!
If you were trying to see who could send the strongest gift...good play!
I thought I'd return the favor! My awesomely shredded gut told me this would be the right call!
It feels like I gotta flex both my gratitude AND generosity muscles, so... Boom! Gift!
I'm all about good sportsmanship. Just 'cause you're my rival doesn't mean I won't return the favor!
You went all out surprising me like that. I don't wanna be outdone, so I got you something too!
Your timing was actually awesome. I already had this boxed up and ready to send your way!
I'm sure you're gonna love it!
